title: NBA 2K25 Dunked to $69, 59% Off a Spidey, Uncommonly Cheap Mario Games, and 80 Bucks Off an Elite Controller!
description: Let's close this week out with a ton of savings on the things that matter the most‚Äîvideo games!
author: Adam Mathew
byline: The Best Gaming Deals In Australia
excerpt: Let's close this week out with a ton of savings on the things that matter the most‚Äîvideo games!
text: Save on Spideys, then save New York again.Thank your own personal deity‚Äîpossibly Malvirta Drako Eht‚Äîit's Friday! We're going to round this week out with a bunch of bargains on Mario-centric titles that usually aren't this cheap, some discounted keyboards, and a marvellous Spidey saving (or two). Stay safe, save often, and see you Monday! In retro news, I'm throwing a 33rd birthday lunch for Streets of Rage. The main course: bin-sourced chickens. Some of my fondest gaming memories are of toe-tapping to Yuzo Koshiro's sick beats as I co-oped through Sega's worthy Final Fight competitor. After the initial argument over who got to be Axel, you almost always had a jagged alliance with sneaky kidney hits and outright in-fights to the death if your bud taxed too many baseball bats / apples / money sacks. Personally, I saved my aggression for the 'bad ending' choice where one may betray their fellow vigilante cop for the crime boss throne instead. html:
Save on Spideys, then save New York again.

Thank your own personal deity‚Äîpossibly Malvirta Drako Eht‚Äîit's Friday! We're going to round this week out with a bunch of bargains on Mario-centric titles that usually aren't this cheap, some discounted keyboards, and a marvellous Spidey saving (or two). Stay safe, save often, and see you Monday!

In retro news, I'm throwing a 33rd birthday lunch for Streets of Rage. The main course: bin-sourced chickens. Some of my fondest gaming memories are of toe-tapping to Yuzo Koshiro's sick beats as I co-oped through Sega's worthy Final Fight competitor. After the initial argument over who got to be Axel, you almost always had a jagged alliance with sneaky kidney hits and outright in-fights to the death if your bud taxed too many baseball bats / apples / money sacks. Personally, I saved my aggression for the 'bad ending' choice where one may betray their fellow vigilante cop for the crime boss throne instead.

This Day in Gaming üéÇ

Aussie birthdays for notable games and hardware

- Streets of Rage (MD) 1991. Redux

- Street Fighter Alpha 2 (PS) 1996. Redux

- Tony Hawk's Skateboarding (PS) 1999. Redux

- No One Lives Forever 2 (PC) 2002. eBay

- Folklore (PS3) 2007. eBay

- Left 4 Dead (PC,X360) 2008. Get

- Doom 3: BFG Ed. (PC,PS3,X360) 2012. Redux

- Dance Central 3 (X360) 2012. eBay

Happy Bday Streets of Rage

Table of Contents

  • Nintendo Switch

Nice Savings for Nintendo Switch

Super Mario Bros. Wonder

Wonder establishes a new standard for what 2D Mario platformers should look like. It's colorful, it is alive, and it is joyful. It also managed to surprise and delight me in continually more creative ways thanks to its unpredictable Wonder Effects. 9/10.

  • NBA 2K25 (-40%) - A$49

Steins;Gate

This was awarded Famitsu magazine's coveted annual Game of Excellence award and was voted one of the most emotionally charged ‚Äútear-inducing games‚Äù ever made, in a Famitsu poll. Consider your nasolacrimal ducts warned.

Exciting Bargains for Xbox

Turtle Beach Stealth Ultra

I own one of these and can testify to its greatness. Where the MS Elite 2 was caught lacking, the Stealth excels, loading up on advanced sensors and an excellent design. It performs brilliantly in games where the quickest, most precise control matters.

Pure Scores for PlayStation

NBA 2K25

Though the core gameplay feels familiar, some improvements such as Go-To Moves, Rhythm Shooting, and Shot Timing Profiles also make 2K25 more novel. MyCareer remains the most important mode in the series, and I love the Heart of a Dynasty storyline.
